message:
SYSTEM: SummaryInternship2014-OEG.pdf: Página 19
Types of users 
Interview with users 
 
•Types of users in the LONI Pipeline 
 
•Developers: usually write components, develop programs and create 
workflows. Usually bioinformaticians and engineers. 
 
•Beginner programmers: can  write small scripts and program 
spreadsheets for statistical analysis. They mainly reuse workflows from 
others. Typically, they are neuroscientists. 
 
•Non-programmers: cannot write code. They reuse workflows from 
others. Typically students. 
 
19
speaker: SYSTEM
